attributes.additional_details: I want the government to teach all children basic first aid so when they leave school they have the tools to save a life, I believe this will save many people from needless deaths.
attributes.background: I want schools to teach kids basic first aid like CPR

rejection.details:
How to administer CPR is already part of the health curriculum for secondary schools, which you can see on page 38 of the curriculum guidance here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1090195/Relationships_Education_RSE_and_Health_Education.pdf
